text: Grant Wehrli is a Republican member of the Illinois House of Representatives who represents the 41st district. The 41st district is located in the Naperville area.http://elections.il.gov/Downloads/VotingInformation/PDF/2011Districts/2011RepDist41.pdf ==Electoral history== ==References== ==External links== *Profile at Ballotpedia Category:Living people Category:Illinois Republicans Category:Southern Illinois University alumni Category:Members of the Illinois House of Representatives Category:Politicians from Naperville, Illinois Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Grant Wehrli
